text: Sir Robert de Zouche Hall, GCMG (27 April 1904 â€“ 19 March 1995)Sir Robert De Zouche Hall gravestone was an English colonial governor. He served in Sierra Leone and Tanganyika. He moved from the United Kingdom to New Zealand in 1973. He settled in Gisborne. ==References== Category:1904 births Category:1995 deaths Category:Knights Commander of the Order of St Michael and St George Category:Sierra Leonean politicians
